item.description:
Be sure to attend our Monthly Meeting on Monday, August 17, 2009.
5:30-9:00 pm
Guest Speaker: Jeff Kaller - Foreclosures and negotiating short sales.
Crowne Plaza Hotel
100 Berlin Road
Cromwell, CT

Register Now for our Monthly Meeting with Jeff Kaller, who will discuss Pre-foreclosures and negotiating short sales.

Watch Jeff Kallers personal invitation and sneak peak into Monday's seminar:
http://www.youtube.co...
http://www.youtube.co...

Where's the Money?
Raise Capital with Other People's Retirement Accounts

- The basics of self-directed retirement accounts
- An Introduction to some business development strategies for self-directed retirement accounts
- A glimpse of an example note: inside vs. outside of an IRA
- Why the time is right for you to "pop the question"

5:30
Members Workshop
Raise Capital with IRAs

5:40-6:40
Network with investors,
vendors, and professionals

6:40-7:00
Bring your deals, announcements

7:00-9:00
Find out how to make money
with pre-foreclosures and short sales with Jeff Kaller.


About Jeff Kaller
In his real estate investing career, Jeff Kaller has personally negotiated over 400 short sale and pre-foreclosure properties. In the last 7 years alone, Jeff has trained well over 100,000 people in live seminars how to do short sales and pre-foreclosures. Probably tens of thousands more on the Internet. His training is considered by many to be top notch. To date, Jeff has negotiated DOWN over $1 Billion dollars in debt with banks and lenders on behalf of the seller. To date, through his students efforts and Jeff, they have saved over 1 million families from the indignities of foreclosure. Given our current economy, with your help, Jeff's goal is to save 1 million families more from foreclosure this year.

Join Jeff Kaller on August 17th to learn his effective techniques.

group.name: CT REIA - The Connecticut Real Estate Investors Assn. Meetup

item.name: CT REIA Monthly Meeting: Pre-foreclosures and negotiating short sales
